segments.text: This kitchen scene is unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is so absorbed in her task, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, soaking everything below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the puddle without a clue, it's heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is risking it all on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like his life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, arm extended for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the cabinets getting all wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids might get caught or hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom should really turn around and see what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just one of those everyday disasters brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR
